name: ACORE AI Token
description: ACORE AI is an virtual agent platform that uses photorealistic 3D human avatars to provide natural conversation, emotional expression, and contextual understanding. It combines cutting edge artificial intelligence with these avatars, allowing them to speak, interact, and react with human like authenticity. The platform is designed for scalability and reliability, enabling organizations to deploy sophisticated virtual agents across multiple channels while maintaining a consistent and engaging user experience.
